definition.content: tuple of axis name, axis abbreviation, axis direction, axis unit and further information

notes.content: This definition is established in accordance with ISO 19111:2019, Table 26 and subclause 10.4.
Inside a coordinate reference system (CRS) containing several axes the axis names are required to be pairwise different.

The axis unit (of measure) defines the set of values which can be used as a coordinate along this axis. These can be numbers (such as in Latitude and Longitude) or general strings (such as in timestamps or special identifiers like "FL100" in aviation).
